column4: Where can I get a list of obotu commands to be used with the preceding "!"?
you can /msg ubotu in a private message or go to his home ;]
yeah to the wierd repos and third party scripts question?
could you please pastebin your sources.list?
[22:10] <Zelta> Pelo: I had used Automatix2 (stupid, I know) to install multimedia codecs. Should I first uninstall automatix2 and everything I installed with it?
automatix is a system breaker; best to back up and reinstall
How should I go about installing necessary codecs?  Is there a documentation page for it?
until you get rid of all the damage automatix has caused (reinstall) then you will get more breakage--just a word of warning
I know.  I am going to reinstall before doing anything else.
using vbox and xp you can: http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=4679554&postcount=33
nay, but have read extensively on ubuntuforums--you may see if they have any new news on that front---> www.ubuntuforums.org
